title: BeepBoopStats
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Email
  

  
  


We specialize in providing data-driven solutions for real-time use.
This includes building tools such as:

websites, for scheduling visits or monitoring your data regularly
interactive dashboards, to visualize/analyze your data in a flexible way
applications, for real-time data gathering and analyses
automated data pipelines, from gathering data to visualizing patterns

Other services include:

statistical analyses, to find patterns in data and devise interventions
data visualization, to identify complex patterns in data in a simple way
data workshops, for hands-on training for analyses and visualizations

title: Contact
text:
You can reach us via email or on Linkedin.

We offer free consulation!
Let’s meet to discuss your needs for a free, 30 min consultation.






Click me to schedule an appointment.

title: BeepBoopStats
text:
personal website
  

  
  


Biplabendu Das, fondly called BILLU, obtained his Ph.D. in bioinformatics, following which he did postdoctoral research at Stanford University.
Billu works as a Data Scientist / Data Engineer for two nationwide, longitudinal studies aimed at understanding brain & cognitive development in adolescents (ABCD Study) & newborn babies (HBCD Study).




Data Scientist/Engineer, J. Craig Venter Institute, Apr 2025 - present
Data Scientist/Engineer, UC San Diego, Aug 2023 - Mar 2025
Postdoctoral Researcher, Stanford University, May 2022 - Oct 2023
